overview: Our story follows a typical day at Val's dude ranch, where not all of the "riding lessons" involve horses.  An ex-nurse (Candida Royalle) helps out an injured cowboy after he's thrown from his bucking bronco.  Prospective students show they have what it takes to make the grade.  It's great to be a cowboy!
tagline: Nubile Nymphs Who Ride Fast and Hard!
title: The Pony Girls
